meanings.definition: A week during which one works.
meanings.sent1: My workweek starts on Monday and ends on Friday.
meanings.sent2: During the workweek, I have to complete all my tasks.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to the workweek to stay productive.
meanings.sent4: The workweek is like a marathon of tasks and deadlines.
meanings.sent5: The workweek feels like a never-ending cycle of work and rest.

meanings.definition: The period of seven consecutive days beginning on Sunday or Monday and ending on Saturday.
meanings.sent1: My workweek includes Monday to Friday, but some people work on weekends too.
meanings.sent2: During the workweek, I have a routine that helps me stay organized.
meanings.sent3: I wish the workweek was shorter so we could have more time for fun.
meanings.sent4: The workweek is like a journey from one weekend to the next.
meanings.sent5: The workweek is a structured cycle that repeats every seven days.
